<script type="text/javascript">
            function getDGECResource(name) {
                var resourceText = '';
                switch (name) {
                    case 'noFurtherInformationAvailable':
                        resourceText = 'Keine weiteren Informationen verfügbar';
                        break;
                    case 'quantity':
                        resourceText = 'Menge:';
                        break;
                    case 'viewBasket':
                        resourceText = 'Warenkorb anschauen (0) Artikel';
                        break;
                    case 'shoppingProductInBasket':
                        resourceText = 'Produkt ist bereits in Ihrem Warenkorb';
                        break;
                    case 'shoppingProductsInBasket':
                        resourceText = 'Produkte sind bereits in Ihrem Warenkorb';
                        break;
                    case 'proceedCheckout':
                        resourceText = 'Weiter mit dem Checkout';
                        break;
                    case 'errorEmail':
                        resourceText = 'Ihre emailadresse darf zwischen 5 und 100 Buchstaben haben';
                        break;
                    case 'errorEmailFormat':
                        resourceText = 'Ihre Emailadresse ist nicht im richtigen Format';
                        break;
                    case 'errorEmailCompare':
                        resourceText = 'Ihre Email und die Email-Bestätigung stimmen nicht überein';
                        break;
                    case 'countryRequired':
                        resourceText = 'Bitte geben Sie ein Land an';
                        break;
                    case 'languageRequired':
                        resourceText = 'Bitte geben Sie eine Sprache an';
                        break;
                    case 'greaterThanEqualTo':
                        resourceText = 'Bitte einen Wert eingeben der größer als oder gleich ist';
                        break;
                    case 'lessThanEqualTo':
                        resourceText = 'Bitte einen Wert angeben der kleiner oder gleich folgendes ist';
                        break;
                    case 'formSubmitError':
                        resourceText = 'Tut mir leid, es gab ein Problem beim Absenden dieses Formulars. Bitte wenden Sie sich an den Kundenservice.';
                        break;
                    case 'addToScrapbook':
                        resourceText = 'Ausschnitt zu Scrapbook hinzufügen';
                        break;
                    case 'pleaseProvideCompanyName':
                        resourceText = 'Bitte einen Firmennamen angeben';
                        break;
                    case 'pleaseProvideName':
                        resourceText = 'Bitte einen Namen angeben';
                        break;
                    case 'pleaseProvideAddressLine1':
                        resourceText = 'Bitte Adresszeile 1 angeben';
                        break;
                    case 'pleaseProvideTown':
                        resourceText = 'Bitte Stadt angeben';
                        break;
                    case 'pleaseProvidePostcode':
                        resourceText = 'Bitte Postleitzahl angeben';
                        break;
                    case 'pleaseSelectCountry':
                        resourceText = 'Bitte Land angeben';
                        break;
                    case 'companyName':
                        resourceText = 'Firmenname';
                        break;
                    case 'name':
                        resourceText = 'Name';
                        break;
                    case 'addressLine1':
                        resourceText = 'Adresse Linie 1';
                        break;
                    case 'addressLine2':
                        resourceText = 'Adresse Linie 2';
                        break;
                    case 'town':
                        resourceText = 'Stadt';
                        break;
                    case 'county':
                        resourceText = 'Bundesland';
                        break;
                    case 'postcode':
                        resourceText = 'Postleitzahl';
                        break;
                    case 'phoneNumber':
                        resourceText = 'Telefonnummer';
                        break;
                    case 'email':
                        resourceText = 'Email';
                        break;
                    case 'searchForAddress':
                        resourceText = 'Adresse suchen';
                        break;
                    case 'country':
                        resourceText = 'Land';
                        break;
                    case 'areYouSure':
                        resourceText = 'Sind Sie sicher?';
                        break;
                    case 'thisWillMarkAddressDeleted':
                        resourceText = 'Ihre Adresse zur Löschung markieren';
                        break;
                    case 'pleaseSelectCountryBefore':
                        resourceText = '';
                        break;
                    case 'kendoPagerDisplay':
                        resourceText = '{0} - {1} von {2} Artikeln\t';
                        break;
                    case 'kendoPagerEmpty':
                        resourceText = 'Keine Artikel zum anzeigen';
                        break;
                    case 'kendoPagerPage':
                        resourceText = 'Seite';
                        break;
                    case 'kendoPagerOf':
                        resourceText = 'von {0}';
                        break;
                    case 'kendoPagerItemsPerPage':
                        resourceText = 'Einträge pro Seite';
                        break;
                    case 'kendoPagerFirstPage':
                        resourceText = 'Gehe zur ersten Seite';
                        break;
                    case 'kendoPagerLastPage':
                        resourceText = 'Gehe zur letzten Seite';
                        break;
                    case 'kendoPagerNextPage':
                        resourceText = 'Gehe zur nächsten Seite';
                        break;
                    case 'kendoPagerPreviousPage':
                        resourceText = 'Gehe zur vorherigen Seite';
                        break;
                    case 'kendoPagerRefresh':
                        resourceText = 'Aktualisieren';
                        break;
                    case 'kendoPagerMorePages':
                        resourceText = 'Mehr Seiten';
                        break;
                    case 'reserveNotAvailable':
                        resourceText = '';
                        break;
                    case 'majorError':
                        resourceText = 'Sie können Ihre Anfrage derzeit nicht stellen. Bitte klicken Sie auf den Zurück Button und versuchen Sie es erneut. Wenn dieses Problem erneut auftritt kontaktieren Sie uns bitte per Mail shoponlineuk@designersguild.com und einer unserer Kundenservice-Mitarbeiter wird sich umgehend bei Ihnen melden. ';
                        break;
                }
                return resourceText;
            }

            kendoGridPagerMessages = {
                display: getDGECResource('kendoPagerDisplay'),
                empty: getDGECResource('kendoPagerEmpty'),

                last: getDGECResource('kendoPagerLastPage'),
                next: getDGECResource('kendoPagerNextPage'),

                refresh: getDGECResource('kendoPagerRefresh'),
                morePages: getDGECResource('kendoPagerMorePages'),
            };

            Number.prototype.formatCurrencyForDisplay = function () {
                    return formatWithComma(Number(this.toFixed(2).replace(/\d(?=(\d{6})+\.)/g, '$&,'), 2, ','));
            }

            function getCurrency() {
                return 'EUR'
            }

            function formatCurrency(value) {
                if (value == null)
                    return value;

                var formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat(
                    'de-DE',
                    {
                        style: 'currency',
                        currency: 'EUR',
                        minimumFractionDigits: 2,
                        maximumFractionDigits: 2
                    });

                return formatter.format(value);
            }

                        </div>
                        <div id="modal-image-container">
                            <!-- ko if: selectedModalImage() -->
                            <img width="1024" height="1024" class="modal-image" data-bind="keepElement: selectedModalImage, event: { 'load': function () { $(selectedModalImage.DOMElement).stop().fadeIn(); } }, attr: { src: '/image/1024/' + selectedModalImage().imageId, alt: typeof selectedModalImage().altText === 'undefined' ?                             <!-- /ko -->
                            <!-- ko if: nextModalImage() -->
                            <img width="1024" height="1024" class="modal-image" style="display: none;" data-bind="keepElement: nextModalImage, event: { 'load': function () { $(nextModalImage.DOMElement).stop().fadeIn(); } }, attr: { src: '/image/1024/' + nextModalImage().imageId, alt: typeof nextModalImage().altText === 'undefined' ?                             <!-- /ko -->
                            <!-- ko with: selectedModalImage -->
                            <!-- ko foreach: hotspots -->
                            <!-- ko template: { name: 'hotspot-template', data: $.extend($data, { forceRight: false, hotspotClass: 'hotspot-a' }) } --><!-- /ko -->
                            <!-- /ko -->
                            <!-- /ko -->
                            <!-- ko with: nextModalImage -->
                            <!-- ko foreach: hotspots -->
                            <!-- ko template: { name: 'hotspot-template', data: $.extend($data, { forceRight: false, hotspotClass: 'hotspot-b' }) } --><!-- /ko -->
                            <!-- /ko -->
                            <!-- /ko -->
                            <div id="popup-marker-container">

                        </div>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

        <div class="mdc-text-field mdc-text-field--outlined" data-bind="mdcTextFieldComponent: { boundTo: observable, useNativeValidation: useNativeValidation }, 
                validationOptions: { insertMessages: insertValidationMessages, decorateInputElement: decorateInputElement },
                css: { 'mdc-text-field--disabled': typeof readOnly == 'undefined' ? false : ko.unwrap(readOnly) },
             enterKey: typeof enterKey === 'undefined' ? null : enterKey">
            <input type="text" class="mdc-text-field__input" data-bind="keepElement: observable, forceNullOnEmpty: observable, textInput: observable, charsRemaining: charsRemainingOptions, enable: typeof readOnly == 'undefined' ? true : !ko.unwrap(readOnly), hasFocus: (typeof focusObservable === 'undefined' ? ko.observable() : focusObservable), css: { 'ui-autocomplete-loading': typeof busy === 'undefined' ? false : busy }" />
            <div class="mdc-notched-outline">
                <div class="mdc-notched-outline__leading"></div>
                <div class="mdc-notched-outline__notch">

                        <span data-bind="text: label"></span>
                    </label>
                </div>
                <div class="mdc-notched-outline__trailing"></div>
            </div>
            <!-- ko if: typeof permitRevert != 'undefined' && permitRevert && typeof revertFunction === 'function' && typeof originalValue != 'undefined' -->

                <i class="material-icons">
                    replay
                </i>
            </div>
            <!-- /ko -->

                &times;
            </div>
            <!-- /ko -->
        </div>
    </div>

            window.onerror = function (message, source, lineno, colno, error) {
                $.ajax({
                    url: '/api/generalapi/LogClientError',
                    type: 'POST',
                    dataType: 'json',
                    data: {
                        message: message + '\n' + (error.stack || ''),
                        source: source,
                        lineno: lineno,
                        colno: colno,
                        error: error,
                        url: window.location.href
                    }
                });
            }

<script type="text/javascript">
            // css-tricks.com/the-complete-guide-to-lazy-loading-images
             function lazyLoadImages() {
                    var lazyloadImages;    

                    if ("IntersectionObserver" in window) {
                    lazyloadImages = document.querySelectorAll("img.lazy");
                    var imageObserver = new IntersectionObserver(function(entries, observer) {
                        entries.forEach(function(entry) {
                        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                            var image = entry.target;
                            image.src = image.dataset.src;
                            image.classList.remove("lazy");
                            imageObserver.unobserve(image);
                        }
                        });
                    });

                    lazyloadImages.forEach(function(image) {
                        imageObserver.observe(image);
                    });
                    } else {  
                    var lazyloadThrottleTimeout;
                    lazyloadImages = document.querySelectorAll(".lazy");
    
                    function lazyload () {
                        if(lazyloadThrottleTimeout) {
                        clearTimeout(lazyloadThrottleTimeout);
                        }    

                        lazyloadThrottleTimeout = setTimeout(function() {
                        var scrollTop = window.pageYOffset;
                        lazyloadImages.forEach(function(img) {
                            if(img.offsetTop < (window.innerHeight + scrollTop)) {
                                img.src = img.dataset.src;
                                img.classList.remove('lazy');
                            }
                        });
                        if(lazyloadImages.length == 0) { 
                            document.removeEventListener("scroll", lazyload);
                            window.removeEventListener("resize", lazyload);
                            window.removeEventListener("orientationChange", lazyload);
                        }
                        }, 20);
                    }

                    document.addEventListener("scroll", lazyload);
                    window.addEventListener("resize", lazyload);
                    window.addEventListener("orientationChange", lazyload);
                    }
                }
                document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", lazyLoadImages)
        </script>
<script type="text/javascript">
            ko.bindingHandlers['attr'] = {
                'update': function(element, valueAccessor, allBindings) {
                    var value = ko.utils.unwrapObservable(valueAccessor()) || {};
                    ko.utils.objectForEach(value, function(attrName, attrValue) {
                        attrValue = ko.utils.unwrapObservable(attrValue);
                        if (attrValue == null)
                            attrValue = '';

                        

                        var prefixLen = attrName.indexOf(':');
                        var namespace = "lookupNamespaceURI" in element && prefixLen > 0 && element.lookupNamespaceURI(attrName.substr(0, prefixLen));

                        var toRemove = (attrValue === false) || (attrValue === null) || (attrValue === undefined);
                        if (toRemove) {
                            namespace ? element.removeAttributeNS(namespace, attrName) : element.removeAttribute(attrName);
                        } else {
                            attrValue = attrValue.toString();
                        }

                        if (ko.utils.ieVersion <= 8 && attrName in attrHtmlToJavaScriptMap) {
                            attrName = attrHtmlToJavaScriptMap[attrName];
                            if (toRemove)
                                element.removeAttribute(attrName);
                            else
                                element[attrName] = attrValue;
                        } else if (!toRemove) {
                            namespace ? element.setAttributeNS(namespace, attrName, attrValue) : element.setAttribute(attrName, attrValue);
                        }

                        if (attrName === "name") {
                            ko.utils.setElementName(element, toRemove ? "" : attrValue);
                        }
                    });
                }
            };
        </script>
<script type="text/javascript">

            ko.options.deferUpdates = true;

            if (!String.prototype.endsWith) {
                String.prototype.endsWith = function(search, this_len) {
                    if (this_len === undefined || this_len > this.length) {
                        this_len = this.length;
                    }
                    return this.substring(this_len - search.length, this_len) === search;
                };
            }
        
            function formatNumber(value, digits, culture) {
                var formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat(
                    culture, {
                        minimumFractionDigits: digits,
                        maximumFractionDigits: digits
                    });

                return formatter.format(value);
            }

        </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
        function addToBasket(productId, lineNumber, maxQuantity, event, hotspot) {

            var tempText = '#quantity-' + lineNumber;
            var storeQuantity = lineNumber === null ? 1 : parseInt($(tempText).val());



            $.ajax({
                url: "/api/basket/AddToBasket",
                type: "Post",
                cache: false,
                async: true,
                data: JSON.stringify({
                    productId: productId,
                    quantity: storeQuantity,
                    basketCountry: 'de',
                    priceListId: getPriceListID()
                }),
                contentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',
                success: function (data) {

                    if (data.handleErrorMessage) {
                        return;
                    }

                    if (typeof updateDotDigital === 'function') {
                        updateDotDigital();
                    }

                    if (data.quantityDisplay) {

                        if (typeof hotspot !== 'undefined') {
                            $(hotspot).attr("title", storeQuantity.toString() + ' Artikel wurde Ihrem Warenkorb hinzugefügt');
                            $(hotspot).tooltip("open");
                            window.setTimeout(function () { $(hotspot).tooltip("close"); $(hotspot).attr("title", ""); }, 5000);
                        }

                        //$(tempText).val('1');   //  Reset the quantity to 1
                        tempText = '#basket-' + lineNumber;
                        $(tempText).attr('title', data.basketLineText);
                        
                        $(tempText).tooltip("open");
                        window.setTimeout(function () { $(tempText).tooltip("close"); $(tempText).attr("title", ""); }, 5000);

                        //  Update the header summary
                        $('#basketSummaryDisplay').text(data.quantityDisplay);

                        $('#alreadyinbasket-' + lineNumber).text(data.basketLineText);
                    }
                    else {

                        if (typeof hotspot !== 'undefined') {
                            $(hotspot).attr("title", data);
                            $(hotspot).tooltip("open");
                            window.setTimeout(function () { $(hotspot).tooltip("close"); $(hotspot).attr("title", ""); }, 5000);
                        }

                        $(tempText).attr("title", data);
                        $(tempText).tooltip("open");
                        window.setTimeout(function () { $(tempText).tooltip("close"); $(tempText).attr("title", ""); }, 5000);
                    }

                    PerformCountryAwarenessPopup(event);

                    if (typeof (fbq === 'function')) {
                        fbq('track', 'AddToCart', {
                            content_ids: [productId.toString()],
                            content_type: 'product',
                            value: Number(data.valueDecimal),
                            currency: data.currency
                        });
                    }
                },
                error: function (xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                    console.log('dg-addToBasket: ' + textStatus);
                    alert('Sie können Ihre Anfrage derzeit nicht stellen. Bitte klicken Sie auf den Zurück Button und versuchen Sie es erneut. Wenn dieses Problem erneut auftritt kontaktieren Sie uns bitte per Mail shoponlineuk@designersguild.com und einer unserer Kundenservice-Mitarbeiter wird sich umgehend bei Ihnen melden. ');
                }
            });
        }
    </script>
<script>
            // Load YouTube iFrame API.
            var tag = document.createElement('script');
            tag.src = "https://www.youtube.com/iframe_api";
            var firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
            firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);

            function onYouTubeIframeAPIReady() {
                $(".youtube-frame").each(function () {
                    var slider = $(this).parent();
                    var sortOrder = slider.data("sort-order");
                    var slideId = slider.data("slide-id");
                    var animId = slider.data("animation-id");

                    var identifier = "animation-" + animId + "-slide" + slideId + "player";

                    window[identifier] = new YT.Player($(this)[0], {
                        events: {
                            'onStateChange': function (event) {
                                if (event.data == YT.PlayerState.PLAYING) {
                                    slider.trigger('bjqs.pause');
                                } else if (event.data == YT.PlayerState.ENDED) {
                                    if (window[identifier].bjqsShouldLoop) {
                                        window[identifier].playVideo();
                                    } else {
                                        slider.trigger('bjqs.unpause')
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    });

                    if (slider.siblings().length == 0) {
                        window[identifier].bjqsShouldLoop = true;
                    } else {
                        window[identifier].bjqsShouldLoop = false;
                    }

                    window[identifier].bjqsSortOrder = sortOrder;
                    window[identifier].addEventListener("onReady", "onYouTubePlayerReady");
                });
            };

            function onYouTubePlayerReady(event) {
                if (event.target.bjqsSortOrder == 0) {
                    event.target.playVideo();
                }
            }

            var lastClickedMarker = "";

            function registerMarkerTouch(pageSectionID) {
                if ("ontouchstart" in window) {

                    var containerWidth = $('#slideshow-container-' + pageSectionID).width();
                    var containerHeight = $('#slideshow-container-' + pageSectionID).height();

                    if (containerWidth === 0 && containerHeight === 0) {
                        return;
                    }


                    ////Swipe functionality
                    //$("#slideshow-container-" + pageSectionID + " .bjqs-slide").on("swiperight", function (e) {
                    //    $('.bjqs-prev a').click();
                    //});
                    //$("#slideshow-container-" + pageSectionID + " .bjqs-slide").on("swipeleft", function (e) {
                    //    $('.bjqs-next a').click();
                    //});


                    $(".marker").mouseleave(function () {
                        lastClickedMarker = "";
                    });

                    var $slideshowContainer = $("#slideshow-container-" + pageSectionID);
                    $slideshowContainer.find(".bjqs-slide").find(".marker").each(function () {
                        $(this).click(function (e) {

                            if (lastClickedMarker === $(this).attr('id')) { }
                            else {
                                e.preventDefault();
                            }
                            lastClickedMarker = $(this).attr('id');
                        });
                    });
                }
            }

            function setMarkerPositions(pageSectionID) {

                var containerWidth = $('#slideshow-container-' + pageSectionID).width();
                var containerHeight = $('#slideshow-container-' + pageSectionID).height();

                if (containerWidth === 0 && containerHeight === 0) {
                    return;
                }

                var slideShowCount = $('#slideshowCounter').attr("data-slideshowcount");

                for (i = 0; i < slideShowCount; i++) {
                    var markerCount = $("#" + "markerCounter" + i).attr("data-markerCount");

                    for (j = 0; j < markerCount; j++) {
                        var markerTop;
                        var markerLeft;
                        var markerId = "hotspotMarker" + i + j;
                        var widthOnePercent = containerWidth / 100;
                        var heightOnePercent = containerHeight / 100;
                        var top = parseFloat($("#" + markerId).attr("data-topPercent"));
                        var left = parseFloat($("#" + markerId).attr("data-leftPercent"));

                        if (top > 0) {
                            markerTop = (heightOnePercent * top) - 13;
                            markerTop = (markerTop / containerHeight) * 100;
                        }
                        else {
                            markerTop = top;
                        }

                        if (left > 0) {
                            markerLeft = (widthOnePercent * left) - 13;
                            markerLeft = (markerLeft / containerWidth) * 100;
                        }
                        else {
                            markerLeft = left;
                        }

                        $("#" + markerId).css("top", markerTop + "%");
                        $("#" + markerId).css("left", markerLeft + "%");
                    }
                }

            }

        </script>

            function getMasterPageResource(resource) {
                switch(resource)  {
                    case 'collection':
                        return 'Kollektion';
                        break;
                    case 'design':
                        return 'Design';
                        break;
                    case 'brand':
                        return 'Marke';
                        break;
                }
            }

            function CreateBackInStockReminder(productId) {
                $.ajax({
                    url: "/api/member/createBackInStockReminder",
                    type: "POST",
                    cache: false,
                    async: true,
                    data: {
                        productId: productId,
                        countryId: getCountryID(),
                        languageId: getLanguageID()
                    },
                    success: function (data) {
                        //console.log(data);
                        if (data.mustLogin) {
                            $("#back-in-stock-reminder-please-log-in").show();
                            $("#back-in-stock-reminder").modal('show');
                        }
                        if (data.success) {
                            $("#back-in-stock-reminder-please-log-in").hide();
                            $("#back-in-stock-reminder-text").html('Wir haben Ihre Erinnerung erhalten und werden Sie benachrichtigen, sobald die Ware wieder lagernd ist.<br/><br/>Sie werden in Kürze eine Bestätigung mit allen Angaben per mail erhalten.');
                            $("#bisr-header").html('Danke')
                            $("#back-in-stock-reminder").modal('show');
                        }
                    },
                    error: function (xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                        console.log(textStatus);
                    }
                });
            }

            var keepSessionAliveTimer = 0;

            function keepSessionAlive() {
                window.clearTimeout(keepSessionAliveTimer);
                keepSessionAliveTimer = window.setTimeout(function (event) {
                    $.ajax({
                        url: "/api/member/keepSessionAlive",
                        type: "Post",
                        cache: false,
                        async: true,
                        data: null,
                        contentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',
                        success: function (data) {
                            keepSessionAlive();
                        },
                        error: function (xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                            keepSessionAlive();
                        }
                    });
                }, 600000);
            }
            


        function hideMarkers() {
            $('.bjqs').find(".bjqs-slide").find(".marker").each(function () {
                $(this).hide();
            });
        }

        function showMarkers() {
            $('.bjqs').find(".bjqs-slide").find(".marker").each(function () {
                $(this).show();
            });
        }
            function doNewsletterNavigate() {
                var url = '';
                if (($('#newsletterText').val().trim() == '') || ($('#newsletterText').val().trim() == 'Ihre E-Mail Adresse')) {
                    url = '/de/Newsletter abonnieren/l100';
                }
                else {
                    url = '/de/Newsletter abonnieren/l100?newsletterEmail=' + encodeURIComponent($('#newsletterText').val());
                }
                window.location.href = url;
                return false;
            }

            function doPopupNewsletterNavigate() {
                var url = '';
                if (($('#newsletterText2').val().trim() == '') || ($('#newsletterText2').val().trim() == 'Ihre E-Mail Adresse')) {
                    url = '/de/Newsletter abonnieren/l100';
                }
                else {
                    url = '/de/Newsletter abonnieren/l100?newsletterEmail=' + encodeURIComponent($('#newsletterText2').val());
                }
                window.location.href = url;
                return false;
            }

            function hideTooltip(elementName, elementClass) {
                var $element = $('#' + elementName);
                $element.tooltip('close');
                $element.attr('title', '');
                $element.removeClass(elementClass);
            }

            function displayTooltip(elementName, message, elementClass) {
                var $element = $('#' + elementName);
                if ($element.data('ui-tooltip')) { }
                else {
                    $element.tooltip({ tooltipClass: elementClass }, { show: { effect: 'fadeIn', duration: 400 } });
                }
                $element.attr('title', message);
                $element.tooltip('open');
                $elementName.addClass(elementClass);
                window.setTimeout(function () { $element.tooltip('close'); }, 5000);
            }

            function logout() {
                $.ajax({
                    url: "/api/member/signout",
                    type: "Post",
                    cache: false,
                    async: true,
                    data: null,
                    contentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',
                    success: function (data) {
                        window.location.href = "/de";
                    },
                    error: function (xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                        console.log('dg-signout: ' + textStatus);
                    }
                });
            }

            jQuery(document).ready(function ($) {
                $.cookieCuttr({
                    cookieAnalytics: false,
                    cookieExpires: 365,
                    cookieAcceptButtonText: 'Cookies akzeptieren',
                    cookieMessage: 'Wir benutzen Cookies auf dieser Website, Sie können <a href="{{cookiePolicyLink}}" style="font-family: Arial;" title="lesen Sie über unsere cookies">lesen Sie darüber hier.</a> Bitte benutzen Sie die Website wie vorgesehen...',
                    cookiePolicyLink: '/de/cookie-Sicherheit/l1011'
                });

                keepSessionAlive();

                $("#wrapperGrey").hide();
                $("#wrapperGrey").removeClass('initial');

                if ("ontouchstart" in window) {

                    var lastClickedMenu = "";

                    $("#wrapperGrey").on('touchend', function (e) {
                        $("#nav").children("li").each(function () {
                            $(this).children(".subMenu").css('left', '-999em');
                        });
                        $("#wrapperGrey").fadeOut(300);
                                 showMarkers();
                        lastClickedMenu = ""
                        e.preventDefault();
                    });

                    $("#nav").children("li").each(function () {
                        $(this).click(function (e) {
                            var $menuToOpen = $(this);
                            $("#nav").children("li").each(function () {
                                if ($(this).attr('data-menuId') === $menuToOpen.attr('data-menuId')) {
                                    $("#wrapperGrey").fadeIn(300);
                                             hideMarkers();
                                    $menuToOpen.children(".subMenu").css('left', '0');
                                    if ($menuToOpen.children(".subMenu").length === 0) { }
                                    else if (lastClickedMenu === $(this).attr('data-menuId')) { }
                                    else {
                                        e.preventDefault();
                                    }
                                    lastClickedMenu = $(this).attr('data-menuId');
                                }
                                else {
                                    $(this).children(".subMenu").css('left', '-999em');
                                }
                            })
                        });
                    })
                } else {
                    var shouldShowBackground = false;
                    $('#nav').mouseenter(function () {
                        shouldShowBackground = true;
                        setTimeout(function () {
                            if (shouldShowBackground) {
                                $("#wrapperGrey").fadeIn(100);
                            }
                        }, 250);
                    });

                    $('#nav').mouseleave(function (event) {
                        shouldShowBackground = false;
                        $("#wrapperGrey").fadeOut(100);
                    });

                    $("#nav").children("li").each(function () {
                        var $subMenu = $(this).children(".subMenu");
                        var shouldShowMenu = false;

                        $(this).mouseenter(function () {
                            shouldShowMenu = true;
                            hideMarkers();
                            setTimeout(function () {
                                if (shouldShowMenu) {
                                    $subMenu.css('left', '0');
                                }
                            }, 250);
                        });

                        $(this).mouseleave(function (event) {
                            shouldShowMenu = false;
                            showMarkers();
                            $subMenu.css('left', '-999em');
                        });
                    })
                }

                        if ($(this).data('in-progress')) {
                            return;
                        } else {

                            $("#basketdrop").stop(true, true).fadeIn(300);

                                success: function (data) {

                                        basketSummary = basketSummary + '<a class="bd-view" href="/l201">' + getDGECResource('viewBasket').replace('{0}', Enumerable.From(data.basketItems).Select('+$.Quantity').Sum()) + '</a>';

                                        else {
                                            basketSummary = basketSummary + '<span class="bd-msg">' + data.promotionalMessage + '</span>';
                                        }

                                        var basketSummary = '<p style="padding-top:10px;">Es sind keine Artikel in Ihrem Warenkorb</p>';

                                    $(this).data('in-progress', false);
                                },

                                    $(this).data('in-progress', false);
                                    console.log('dg-basketsummary: ' + textStatus);
                                }
                            });
                        }

                if ($("#searchText").length > 0) {
                    $("#searchText").autocomplete({
                        minLength: 2,
                        delay: 500,
                        source: function (request, response) {
                            $.ajax({
                                url: "/api/search/getPredictiveSearch",
                                type: "POST",
                                dataType: "json",
                                data: {
                                    basketCountry: getCountryDetails(),
                                    searchText: request.term,
                                    productTypeId: $("#search-scope option:selected").data("product-type-id")
                                },
                                success: function (data) {
                                    // need to map the two result sets and return both combined...
                                    var collections = $.map(data.predictiveSearchHints.collections, function(item) {
                                        return {
                                        label: item.Heading,
                                            value: item.Heading,
                                            url: item.URLKeywords,
                                            type: 'coll'
                                        }
                                    });
                                    var designs = $.map(data.predictiveSearchHints.designs, function(item) {
                                        return {
                                        label: item.Heading,
                                            value: item.Heading,
                                            url: item.URLKeywords,
                                            type: 'des',
                                            productType: item.ProductType
                                        }
                                    });
                                    var products = $.map(data.predictiveSearchHints.products, function(item) {
                                        return {
                                        label: item.Heading,
                                            value: item.Heading,
                                            url: item.URLKeywords,
                                            type: 'prod',
                                            sku: item.Code
                                        }
                                    });
                                    var brands = $.map(data.predictiveSearchHints.brands, function(item) {
                                        return {
                                        label: item.Heading,
                                            value: item.Heading,
                                            url: item.URLKeywords,
                                            type: 'brand'
                                        }
                                    });
                                    var discos = $.map(data.predictiveSearchHints.discontinueds, function (item) {
                                        return {
                                            label: '',
                                            value: item.DiscontinuedMessage,
                                            type: 'disc'
                                        };
                                    });
                                    var suggestions = $.map(data.predictiveSearchResults.predictiveSearchs, function (item) {
                                        return {
                                        label: item.Keyword,
                                            value: item.Keyword,
                                            type: 'sug'
                                        };
                                    });
                                    response(
                                        discos.concat(brands).concat(collections).concat(designs).concat(products).concat(suggestions)
                                    )
                                },
                                error: function (result) {
                                 console.log(result);
                                }
                            })
                        },
                        select: function (event, ui) {
                            switch(ui.item.type) {
                                case 'coll':
                                case 'des':
                                case 'prod':
                                case 'brand':
                                    window.location.href = ui.item.url;
                                    break;
                                case 'disc':
                                    break;
                                default:
                                    $("#searchText").val(ui.item.value);
                                    $(".searchform").submit();
                                    break;
                            }
                        }, position: {
                            my: "right top",
                            at: "right bottom"
                        },
                         appendTo: $("#searchText").parent()
                    }).data("ui-autocomplete")._renderItem = function (ul, item) {
                        var listItem = $("<li>")
                        if(item.type != 'disc') {
                            listItem.append(item.label.toLowerCase())
                        }
                        listItem.appendTo(ul);
                        switch(item.type) {
                            case 'brand':
                                listItem.addClass("autocomplete-pre-" + item.type);
                                listItem.prepend("<span class='search-hint-right'>" + getMasterPageResource('brand') + "</span>");
                                break;
                            case 'coll':
                                listItem.addClass("autocomplete-pre-" + item.type);
                                listItem.prepend("<span class='search-hint-right'>" + getMasterPageResource('collection') + "</span>");
                                break;
                            case 'des':
                                listItem.addClass("autocomplete-pre-" + item.type);
                                listItem.prepend("<span class='search-hint-right'>" + item.productType + " " + getMasterPageResource('design') + "</span>");
                                break;
                            case 'prod':
                                listItem.addClass("autocomplete-pre-" + item.type);
                                listItem.prepend("<span class='search-hint-right'>" + item.sku + "</span>");
                                break;
                            case 'disc':
                                listItem.addClass("autocomplete-pre-" + item.type);
                                listItem.prepend("<span class='search-hint-right'>" + item.value + "</span>");
                                break;
                            default:

                                break;
                        }
                        return listItem;
                    }
                }

<script id="banner-template" type="text/html">
            <!-- ko if: banners().length -->
            <!-- ko if: heading -->
            <div class="features grid-1-col" data-bind="css: { 'half-width': halfWidth }" style="margin-bottom: 0;">
                <h2 class="grid separator-title" data-bind="text: heading"></h2>
            </div>
            <!-- /ko -->
            <div class="features" data-bind="class: gridWidth, css: { 'half-width': $root.halfWidth }">
                <!-- ko foreach: banners -->

<script type="text/javascript">
    window.addEventListener('load', function () {
        var home = window.location.pathname == '/';
        var product = jQuery('.bto-product-id').length > 0;
        var cart = window.location.pathname.endsWith('/l201');
        var category = jQuery('.latestCollectionBanner').length > 0 || jQuery('.category-options').length > 0;
        var id = '';
        var price = '';
        var pagetype = '';

        if (home) {
            pagetype = "home"
        } else if (category) {
            pagetype = "category"
        } else if (product) {
            pagetype = "product"
            id = new Array();
            var len = jQuery('.bto-product-code').length;
            for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
                id.push(jQuery('.bto-product-code')[i].innerText)
            }
            price = new Array();
            var plen = jQuery('.bto-product-price').length;
            for (j = 0; j < plen; j++) {
                price.push(Number((jQuery('.bto-product-price')[j].innerText.replace(/\s*[^\s\-0-9.]/g, '') / 100) * 100).toFixed(2))
            }
            //console.log('product prices array is', price);
        } else if (cart) {
            pagetype = "cart"
            id = new Array();
            var len = jQuery('.bto-product-code').length;
            for (i = 0; i < len; i++)
                id.push(jQuery('.bto-product-code')[i].innerText)
            var price = parseFloat(jQuery('.bto-sub-total').text().replace(/[^0-9.]/g, ''));
        } else {
            pagetype = "other"
        }

        var google_tag_params = {
            ecomm_prodid: id,
            ecomm_pagetype: pagetype,
            ecomm_totalvalue: price
        };

        if (typeof gtag === 'function') {
            var data = {
                'send_to': 'default',
                'event_label': google_tag_params.ecomm_pagetype,
                'dimension1': google_tag_params.ecomm_prodid,
                'dimension2': google_tag_params.ecomm_pagetype,
                'dimension3': google_tag_params.ecomm_totalvalue,
                'retail_or_trade': 'retail',
                'non_interaction': true
            };
            //console.log('gtag is pushing page_visit with', data);
            gtag('event', 'page_visit', data);
        }
    });

    function gTagAddToCart(basketItem, quantity) {
        if (typeof gtag === 'function') {
            var data = {
                "items": [{
                    "id": ko.unwrap(basketItem.code) || ko.unwrap(basketItem.Code),
                    "name": ko.unwrap(basketItem.basketName) || ko.unwrap(basketItem.BasketName),
                    "quantity": ko.unwrap(quantity),
                    "price": ko.unwrap(basketItem.price) || ko.unwrap(basketItem.Price)
                }]
            };
            //console.log('gtag is pushing add_to_cart with', data);
            gtag('event', 'add_to_cart', data);
        }
    }

    function gTagRemoveFromCart(basketItem, onComplete) {
        if (typeof gtag === 'function') {
            var data = {
                "items": [{
                    "id": ko.unwrap(basketItem.code) || ko.unwrap(basketItem.Code),
                    "name": ko.unwrap(basketItem.basketName) || ko.unwrap(basketItem.BasketName),
                    "price": ko.unwrap(basketItem.price) || ko.unwrap(basketItem.Price)
                }],
                'event_callback': onComplete
            };
            //console.log('gtag is pushing remove_from_cart with', data);
            gtag('event', 'remove_from_cart', data);
        }
    }
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
            function trackOutbound(elem) {
                var url = $(elem).attr('href');
                var target = $(elem).attr('target');

                var newWindow = (target == '_blank');

                var params = function() { };
                if (!newWindow) {
                    params = function() {
                        window.location.href = url;
                    }
                }

                if (typeof gtag === 'function') {
                    gtag('event', 'click', {
                        'send_to': 'default',
                        'event_category': 'outbound',
                        'event_label': url,
                        'transport_type': 'beacon',
                        'event_callback': params
                    });
                } else {
                    window.location.href = url;
                }

                return newWindow;
            }
        </script>

<script type="text/javascript">

    function doSearchNavigate(alt) {

        var elementId = "#searchText";

        if (typeof alt === 'undefined') { }
        else {
            elementId += "2";
        }

        if ($(elementId).val() == "") {

            var url = '/de/Schergebnisse/l76';

            if ($("#search-scope").val() != null) {
                url += '?productType=' + encodeURIComponent($("#search-scope").val());
            }

            window.location.href = url + '';

            return false;
        } else {
            if (($(elementId).val().trim() == '') || ($(elementId).val().trim() == 'Suche nach Produktnamen, Code oder Design')) {

                if ($(elementId).val() === "")
                    return false;

                var url = '/de/Schergebnisse/l76?searchText=&productType=' + encodeURIComponent($("#search-scope").val());

                window.location.href = url;

                return false;

            }
            else {

                var url = '/de/Schergebnisse/l76?searchText=' + encodeURIComponent($(elementId).val())

                if ($("#search-scope").val() != null) {
                    url += '&productType=' + encodeURIComponent($("#search-scope").val())
                }

                window.location.href = url + ''

                return false;
            }
        }
    }

    $(document).ready(function () {
    });
</script>

<script id="menu-banner" type="text/html">
    <div class="menu-thumb" data-bind="style: { 'text-align': textAlign },">
        <!-- ko if: linkURL -->
        <a class="f2" style="padding:0; border-bottom: 0 !important;" data-bind="style: { 'text-align': textAlign }, attr: { href: linkURL }">
            <img class="feature-img menu-thumb" style="max-width: 154px;" data-bind="attr: { width: width, height: height, src: 'https://www.designersguild.com/imagebanner/156/' + bannerId + '?v=' + version, alt: altText || name, title: titleText || name }" />
        </a>
        <!-- /ko -->
        <!-- ko ifnot: linkURL -->
        <img class="feature-img menu-thumb" style="max-width: 154px;" data-bind="attr: { width: width, height: height, src: '/imagebanner/156/' + bannerId + '?v=' + version, alt: altText, title: titleText }" />
        <!-- /ko -->
        <!-- ko if: overlayText -->
        <p data-bind="text: overlayText, class: fontClass, style: { width: '154px', padding: '4px 0', 'background-color': backgroundColour, color: foregroundColour, 'text-align': textAlign }"></p>
        <!-- /ko -->
    </div>
</script>
<script id="menu-banner-lower" type="text/html">
    <!-- ko if: linkURL -->
    <div class="grid-3-col grid sublinks" data-bind="class: fontClass">
        <a data-bind="text: overlayText, attr: { href: linkURL, target: newWindow ? '_blank' : '_self' }, style: { 'background-color': backgroundColour, color: foregroundColour }"></a>
    </div>
    <!-- /ko -->
    <!-- ko ifnot : linkURL -->
    <div class="grid-3-col grid sublinks" data-bind="class: fontClass, style: { 'background-color': backgroundColour, color: foregroundColour }">
        <span data-bind="text: overlayText"></span>
    </div>
    <!-- /ko -->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    const menuBannersViewModel = (function () {
        var self = {};
        self.banners = ko.observableArray(getBanners());
        self.getBanner = function (menuId, bannerLocationId, textAlign) {
            var unrestricted = Enumerable.From(self.banners()).Where(function (x) {
                return x.id == bannerLocationId
            }).SelectMany(function (x) { 
                return x.banners
            }).Where(function (x) { 
                return x.restrictions.menuIds == null
            }).ToArray();

            var restricted = Enumerable.From(self.banners()).Where(function (x) {
                return x.id == bannerLocationId
            }).SelectMany(function (x) { 
                return x.banners
            }).Where(function (x) { 
                if (x.restrictions.menuIds != null) {
                    return x.restrictions.menuIds.indexOf(menuId) > -1
                } else {
                    return false;
                }
            }).ToArray();

            var result = Enumerable.From(unrestricted.concat(restricted)).OrderBy('$.sortOrder').FirstOrDefault();
            if (result) {

                var textAdjust = "";

                switch (textAlign) {
                    case "left":
                        textAdjust = "float: left";
                        break;
                    case "center":
                        textAdjust = "margin: 0 auto";
                        break;
                    case "right":
                        textAdjust = "float: right";
                        break;
                }

                return $.extend(result, {
                    textAlign: textAdjust
                });
            } else {
                return undefined;
            }
        }
        return self;
    });

    var menuBanners = menuBannersViewModel({});

    ko.applyBindings(menuBanners, $('#nav')[0]);
</script> <div id="container" class="row">

<script>
        function resetScrapbookTooltip(ele) {
            if($(ele).data('ui-tooltip')) {
                $(ele).tooltip("close");
                $(ele).tooltip("destroy");
            }
        }

        function setScrapbookErrorTooltip(ele, toolTipMessage) {
            resetScrapbookTooltip(ele);
            $(ele).tooltip({
                show: { effect: "fadeIn", duration: 400 },
                content: function () {
                    var tooltipContent = $('<div />').html( $.parseHTML( toolTipMessage ) );
                    return tooltipContent;
                },
            }).on('mouseout focusout', function(event) {
                event.stopImmediatePropagation();
            });
            $(ele).tooltip( "option", "hide", { effect: "fadeOut", duration: 400 } );
            $(ele).tooltip("option", "tooltipClass", "tooltip-input-error");
            $(ele).tooltip("open");
            window.setTimeout(function () { resetScrapbookTooltip(ele); }, 4000);
        }

        function setScrapbookSuccessTooltip(ele, toolTipMessage) {
            resetScrapbookTooltip(ele);
            $(ele).tooltip({
                show: { effect: "fadeIn", duration: 400 },
                content: function () {
                    var tooltipContent = $('<div />').html( $.parseHTML( toolTipMessage ) );
                    return tooltipContent;
                },
            }).on('mouseout focusout', function(event) {
                event.stopImmediatePropagation();
            });
            $(ele).tooltip( "option", "hide", { effect: "fadeOut", duration: 400 } );
            $(ele).tooltip("option", "tooltipClass", "tooltip-input-okay");
            $(ele).tooltip("open");
            window.setTimeout(function () { resetScrapbookTooltip(ele); }, 4000);
        }

        function asyncRemoveImageFromScrapbook(ImageID, event) {
            $.ajax({
                url: '/api/member/asyncRemoveImageFromScrapbook',
                type: 'POST',
                cache: false,
                async: true,
                data: JSON.stringify({
                    imageId: ImageID,
                    countryId: '60'
                }),
                contentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',
                success: function (data) {
                    asyncReloadScrapbook();
                },
                error: function (xhr, s, a) {
                    setScrapbookErrorTooltip(event.target, 'Es gab ein Problem, dieses Bild aus Ihrem Scrapbook zu entfernen');
                }
            });
        }

        function asyncAddImageToScrapbook(ImageID, ProductPageID, event) {
            $.ajax({
                url: '/api/member/asyncAddImageToScrapbook',
                type: 'POST',
                cache: false,
                async: true,
                data: JSON.stringify({
                    imageId: ImageID,
                    productPageId: ProductPageID,
                    countryId: '60'
                }),
                contentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',
                success: function (data) {
                    if (data === true) {
                        setScrapbookSuccessTooltip(event.target, '<span style="display: block;">Zu Scrapbook hinzugefügt</span><br/><a class="scrapbook-tooltip-link" href="/de/Moodboard/l154">Scrapbook anschauen</a><a class="scrapbook-tooltip-link" href="/de/Moodboard/l154">Moodboard erstellen/bearbeiten</a>');
                        asyncReloadScrapbook();
                    } else {
                        setScrapbookErrorTooltip(event.target, 'Es gab ein Problem, dieses Bild Ihrem Scrapbook hinzuzufügen');
                    }
                },
                error: function (xhr, s, a) {
                    setScrapbookErrorTooltip(event.target, 'Es gab ein Problem, dieses Bild Ihrem Scrapbook hinzuzufügen');
                }
            });
        }

        function asyncReloadScrapbook() {
            var productTypeId = null;
            if ($("#scrapbook-product-type-filter").length) {
                productTypeId = $("#scrapbook-product-type-filter").val() == "null" ? null : $("#scrapbook-product-type-filter").val()
            }

            var brandId = null;
            if ($("#scrapbook-brand-filter").length) {
                brandId = $("#scrapbook-brand-filter").val() == "null" ? null : $("#scrapbook-brand-filter").val();
            }

            var isNew = null;
            if ($("#scrapbook-new-filter").length) {
                isNew = $("#scrapbook-new-filter").is(":checked") ? true : null;
            }

            var top = 20;
            if ($("#scrapbook-top-limit").length) {
                top = $("#scrapbook-top-limit").val();
            }

            if ($("#scrapbook-list").length) {
                $.ajax({
                    url: '/api/member/asyncReloadScrapbook',

                    success: function(data) {
                        if(data.scrapbookImages != null) {

                            var sb = "<div class='cc-wrapper masonry-grid'>"
                                    + "<div class='masonry-grid-sizer'></div>"
                                    + "<div class='masonry-grid-gutter'></div>";
                            for(var i = 0; i < data.scrapbookImages.length; i++) {
                                var t = data.scrapbookImages[i];
                                var disco = "";

                                if(t.Live == false)
                                {
                                    disco = "<div href='javascript:;' class='scrapbook-discontinued'>AUSGELAUFEN</div>"
                                }
                                sb = sb
                                    + "<div class='masonry-grid-item masonry-grid-item-width-" + t.AspectRatioID + "'>"
                                        + "<div style='position: relative'>"
                                            + "<a href='javascript:;'>"
                                                + "<img data-product-page-id='" + t.ProductPageID + "' data-image-id='" + t.ImageID + "' src='/image/322/"+t.ImageID+"' alt='' />"
                                            + "</a>"
                                            + disco
                                            + "<a href='javascript:;' class='scrapbook-delete-btn' onclick='asyncRemoveImageFromScrapbook("+t.ImageID+", event)'>ENTFERNEN</a>"
                                            + (t.ProductPageID == null ? "" : "<a href='" + t.URLKeywords + "' class='scrapbook-product-page-btn'>ANSICHT</a>")
                                        + "</div>"
                                        + "<div class='cc-item-desc'>"
                                            + (t.New ? "<span class='pod-new'>NEU</span>" : "")
                                            + (t.Heading ? "<span class='pod-title'>" + t.Heading.toUpperCase() + "</span>" : "")
                                            + (t.ProductCode ? "<span class='product-code'>" + t.ProductCode + "</span>" : "")
                                        + "</div>"
                                    + "</div>";
                            }
                            sb = sb + "</div>";

                            // leaving this bound isn't a great idea as it is rebound every time an image is added.
                            // the nav buttons are fine as they're recreated each time cc is reinstantiated.
                            if($("#scrapbook-button-holder").length) {
                                $("#scrapbook-list").unbind("mousewheel.contentcarousel");
                                $("#scrapbook-list").html(sb);
                                $("#scrapbook-list").contentcarousel({notInfinite: true});
                                // have to emit the load event again, because cc waits for it...
                                var evt = document.createEvent('Event');
                                evt.initEvent('load', false, false);
                                window.dispatchEvent(evt);
                            }
                            if (typeof configureScrapbookSortable === 'function') {
                                $("#scrapbook-list").html(sb);
                                configureScrapbookSortable();
                            }

                            window.scrapbookGrid = $(".masonry-grid").masonry({
                                itemSelector: '.masonry-grid-item',
                                columnWidth: '.masonry-grid-sizer',
                                percentPosition: true,
                                "gutter": '.masonry-grid-gutter'
                            });

                            window.scrapbookGrid.imagesLoaded().progress( function() {
                                window.scrapbookGrid.masonry('layout');
                            });
                        }
                    },
                    error: function (xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                        console.log('dg-signout: ' + textStatus);
                    }
                });
            }
        }

        function showCountryAwarenessPopup(event) {
            $("#country-awareness-popup").css("display", "block");
            if (typeof event === 'undefined') {
                $("#country-awareness-popup").position({
                    my: 'center',
                    at: 'center',
                    of: window
                });
            }
            else {
                if (event.type === 'readystatechange') {
                    $("#country-awareness-popup").position({
                        my: 'center',
                        at: 'center',
                        of: window
                    });
                }
                else {
                    $("#country-awareness-popup").position({
                        my: 'right top',
                        at: 'center',
                        of: $(event)
                    });
                }
            }
        }

        function hideCountryAwarenessPopup() {
            $("#country-awareness-popup").css("display", "none");
        }

        function hideBackInStockReminderPopup() {
            $("#back-in-stock-reminder").hide();
        }
    </script>

                if (typeof getProductPageModel === 'function') {

                    $(document).ready(function () {
                        let price = viewModel.products().length ? Enumerable.From(viewModel.products()).Select('$.displayPrice').Min() : null;
                        let salePrice = viewModel.products().length ? Enumerable.From(viewModel.products()).Select('$.displaySalePrice').Min() || price : null;
                        let priceMessage = null;
                        if (viewModel.hasOwnProperty('productPagePrice') && !viewModel.hasOwnProperty('checkoutConfirm')) {
                            viewModel.productPagePrice.subscribe(function (newValue) {
                                if (newValue) {

                                    priceMessage = viewModel.productPagePrice().priceMessage || viewModel.productPagePrice().rRPMessage || '';

                                    let priceMessageSplit = priceMessage.split('<br/>');

                                    let productPriceWas = '';
                                    let productPriceNow = '';

                                    if (priceMessageSplit.length == 1) {
                                        productPriceNow = priceMessageSplit[0];
                                    } else {
                                        productPriceWas = priceMessageSplit[0].replace('<span class="strike">', '').replace('</span>', '');
                                        productPriceNow = priceMessageSplit[1].replace('<span class="discount">', '').replace('</span>', '');
                                    }

                                        product_name: ppm.heading || '',
                                        product_url: ('https://www.designersguild.com' + ppm.url) || '',

                                        product_status: $('.no-products-available').length ? 'Not Available' : 'Available',
                                        product_currency: getMasterDefinition().UrlBreakdown.countryDetails.CurrencyCode || '',
                                        product_specialPrice: salePrice || '',
                                        product_price_was: productPriceWas || '',
                                        product_price_now: productPriceNow || '',
                                        product_categories: ppm.category || '',
                                        product_brand: ppm.brand || ''
                                    };

                                    if (ddpp != null) {
                                        console.log('dotDigital is pushing track with', ddpp);
                                        window.dmPt('track', ddpp);
                                    }
                                }
                            })
                        } else {

                    });

                    console.log('dotDigital is pushing track without details');

                function updateDotDigital() {
                    $.ajax({
                        url: '/api/basket/DotDigitalJSON',
                        type: 'POST',
                        dataType: 'json',
                        async: true,
                        data: getMasterDefinition(),
                        success: function (data) {
                            let d = JSON.parse(data);
                            d.cartUrl = window.location.href;
                            console.log('dotDigital is pushing cartInsight with', d);
                            if (typeof window.dmPt === 'function') {
                                window.dmPt("cartInsight", d);
                            }
                        }
                    });
                }

                <div id="s2stage-two" style="width: 100%; height: auto; position: relative;" data-bind="visible: success() == true">
                    <a href="javascript:;" class="close-btn" style="z-index: 10" data-bind="click: closeDGCEPop"></a>
                    <!-- ko with: banner -->
                    <!-- ko if: linkURL -->
                    <a data-bind="click: function (data, event) { event.stopPropagation(); window.location.href = linkURL }, attr: { href: linkURL }">
                        <img style="width: 100%; display: block;" data-bind="attr: { src: 'https://www.designersguild.com/imagebanner/1024/' + bannerId + '-B?v=' + version, alt: altText }" />
                    </a>
                    <!-- /ko -->
                    <!-- ko ifnot: linkURL -->
                    <img style="width: 100%; display: block; cursor: pointer" data-bind="click: $parent.closeDGECPop, attr: { src: 'https://www.designersguild.com/imagebanner/1024/' + bannerId + '-B?v=' + version, alt: altText }" />
                    <!-- /ko -->
                    <!-- /ko -->
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
            
        $(window).bind("load", function () {
                if (Enumerable.From(getBanners()).Where(function (x) {
                    return x.id == 55 && x.banners.length
                }).Any()) {
                    if ($.cookie('dgEC_popup') === null) {
                        $.cookie('dgEC_popup', '1', { expires: 30, path: '/' });
                    } else {
                        if ($.cookie('dgEC_popup') == '1') {
                            $.cookie('dgEC_popup', '2', { expires: 30, path: '/' });
                        } else {
                            if ($.cookie('dgEC_popup') == '2') {
                                fetchDGECPop();
                                $.cookie('dgEC_popup', '3', { expires: 30, path: '/' });
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            });
            
        
        function showSub2Popup() {
            $("#s2stage-two").hide();
            $("#S2LBOverlay").show();
            $("#s2stage-one").show();
        }

        function closeSub2Popup() {
            $("#S2LBOverlay").hide();
            $("#sub2-popup-email").val(null);
        }

        $("#sub2-email-input").on('focus', function() {
            $("#sub2-email-input").css('background-color', 'transparent');
        });

        var submitPopupEmailBusy = false;

        function submitPopupEmail() {
            if (!submitPopupEmailBusy) {
                submitPopupEmailBusy = true;
                $.ajax({
                    url: '/api/member/validateEmail',
                    method: 'POST',
                    dataType: 'json',
                    data: {
                        emailAddress: $("#sub2-email-input").val()
                    },
                    success: function(data) {
                        if(data.validEmailFormat) {
                            $.ajax({
                                url: '/api/form/savePageSectionForm',
                                method: 'POST',
                                dataType: 'json',
                                data: {
                                    ContentID: 1497,
                                    SourceID: 10,
                                    FormID: 93,
                                    PageSectionID: 5187,
                                    FullName: 'POPUPEMAILSUBMISSION',
                                    SubmitButtonText: 'Popup Email Submission',
                                    HeaderText: 'Popup Email Submission',
                                    FooterText: 'Popup Email Submission',
                                    Email: $("#sub2-email-input").val(),
                                    AddressRequired: false,
                                    ConfirmEmail: false,
                                    PasswordRequired: false,
                                    CaptchaRequired: false,
                                    CountryID: getCountryID(),
                                    LanguageID: getLanguageID(),
                                    MarketingCountryID: getCountryID(),
                                    MarketingLanguageID: getLanguageID()
                                },
                                success: function(data) {
                                    submitPopupEmailBusy = false;
                                    if(data == true) {
                                        $("#s2stage-one").hide();
                                        $("#s2stage-two").show();
                                    } else {
                                        closeSub2Popup();
                                        alert('Sie können Ihre Anfrage derzeit nicht stellen. Bitte klicken Sie auf den Zurück Button und versuchen Sie es erneut. Wenn dieses Problem erneut auftritt kontaktieren Sie uns bitte per Mail shoponlineuk@designersguild.com und einer unserer Kundenservice-Mitarbeiter wird sich umgehend bei Ihnen melden. ')
                                    }
                                },
                                error: function(xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                                    submitPopupEmailBusy = false;
                                    closeSub2Popup();
                                    alert('Sie können Ihre Anfrage derzeit nicht stellen. Bitte klicken Sie auf den Zurück Button und versuchen Sie es erneut. Wenn dieses Problem erneut auftritt kontaktieren Sie uns bitte per Mail shoponlineuk@designersguild.com und einer unserer Kundenservice-Mitarbeiter wird sich umgehend bei Ihnen melden. ')
                                }
                            });
                        } else {
                            submitPopupEmailBusy = false;
                            $("#sub2-email-input").css('background-color', 'rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.2)');
                        }
                    },
                    error: function(xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                        submitPopupEmailBusy = false;
                        alert('Sie können Ihre Anfrage derzeit nicht stellen. Bitte klicken Sie auf den Zurück Button und versuchen Sie es erneut. Wenn dieses Problem erneut auftritt kontaktieren Sie uns bitte per Mail shoponlineuk@designersguild.com und einer unserer Kundenservice-Mitarbeiter wird sich umgehend bei Ihnen melden. ')
                    }
                })
            }
        }
    </script>

            //console.log('hidden.bs.modal', e);
            if($('.modal').hasClass('in')) {
                //console.log('adding modal-open to body');

        });

        function is_IE() {
            return (window.navigator.userAgent.match(/MSIE|Trident/) !== null);
        }
        
        if (is_IE()) {
            alert('Sorry, www.designersguild.com no longer supports Internet Explorer versions 11 and below. Please upgrade to a modern browser.');
        }

<script type="text/javascript">
        var clsScore = 0;

        try {
            var po = new PerformanceObserver(function (list) {
                var entries = list.getEntries();
                for (var i = 0; i < entries.length; i++) {
                    if (!entries[i].hadRecentInput) {
                        clsScore += entries[i].value;
                        //console.log(entries[i]);
                    }
                }
            });
            po.observe({type: 'layout-shift', buffered: true});
        } catch (e) {
            // not supported
        }
    </script>
